title: broken screen, personal data on phone memmory.
content:
Google pixel 2xl to be honest, but there's no option to choose it.
So long story short if there is any way to factory reset my phone when I have broken screen and don't have option to do that from my google account? I need to send my phone for repair but I want to wipe all personal file's first.
I don't know if there's any 100% sure way to prevent anyone who will get my phone for repair won't check my private files.
